profiles.label: SR109 shelterwood corridors
profiles.retention_summary: Two-pass shelterwood with 13–18 m leave strips; excavator forwarding between corridors then tracked skidder relay.

profiles.label: SR109 green-tree retention (25%)
profiles.retention_summary: Dispersed green-tree retention with serpentine forwarding; tracked skidder cleanup where stems misaligned.

profiles.label: SR109 patch cut (0.25 ha)
profiles.retention_summary: 0.25 ha group removals; excavator serpentine forwarding with minimal cleanup.

profiles.label: ADV11N17 Trial 1 – motor-manual CTL (high retention)
profiles.retention_summary: Hand faller + hoe-forwarder protecting dense understory; 3.3% trail coverage.

profiles.label: ADV11N17 Trial 2 – motor-manual full-tree
profiles.retention_summary: Chainsaw + cable skidder with moderate basal-area retention.

profiles.label: ADV11N17 Trial 3 – mechanized full-tree
profiles.retention_summary: Feller-bunchers + grapple skidders; moderate retention with 18% trail coverage.

profiles.label: ADV11N17 Trial 4 – mechanized CTL (production-focused)
profiles.retention_summary: Low-retention benchmark (36% trail/road coverage); treated as ADV11N17 baseline.

profiles.label: ADV1N22 Opening 6 – group selection + clearcut
profiles.retention_summary: Seventeen group-selection pockets with snow-season cable skidding; compared to average small opening clearcuts.

profiles.label: TN199 Quadra Island partial entry (12–15% removal)
profiles.retention_summary: Dispersed select cut with JD450G crawler winching individual trees to permanent skid roads; compared to SR109 clearcut baseline.

profiles.label: ADV9N4 interface fuel-reduction thinning
profiles.retention_summary: Urban-interface thinning from below with tractor/ATV skidding and intensive piling/burning.
